original_text: Melchizedek was the king of a city called Salem. He was also a priest of God who rules over all. Melchizedek met Abraham when Abraham was returning from a war. Abraham's men had just won a battle against four kings with their armies. At that time, Melchizedek asked God to bless Abraham.
korean_text: 이 멜기세덱은 살렘 왕이요 지극히 높으신 하나님의 제사장이라 여러 왕을 쳐서 죽이고 돌아오는 아브라함을 만나 복을 빈 자라

sentences.original_text: Melchizedek was the king of Salem.
He was also a priest of God.
Abraham was returning from a war.
Abraham's men had just won a battle.
They fought against four kings with their armies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 군대와 함께 네 왕들과 싸웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: At that time, Melchizedek asked God.
He asked God to bless Abraham.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 아브라함에게 복을 주시도록 요청했습니다.
